{{ja-kanjitab|ふ|か|し|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ふかし|不|tr1=fu|t1=non-, in-|可視|tr2=kashi|t2=visibility}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|ふかし|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ふかし}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ふかし|physics|optics}} [[invisible]], unable to be [[see]]n

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|不可視光線|ふかし こうせん}}: an [[invisible]] [[ray]] of [[light]]; the invisible [[spectrum]], such as [[ultraviolet]] or [[infrared]]
* {{ja-r|不可視のマント|ふかし の マント}}: a [[cloak]] of [[invisibility]]
{{der-bottom}}

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|見えない|みえない}}: negative of {{m|ja|見える|tr=mieru||to be visible; to seem, to appear}}
* {{ja-r|見えざる|みえざる}}: classical negative attributive of {{m|ja|見える|tr=mieru||to be visible; to seem, to appear}}
* {{ja-r|隠し|かくし}}: hidden
